metadata.dcterms:title: Continuous In-situ Measurements of Anchor Ice Formation, Growth and Release Mechanisms in Rivers
metadata.dcterms:creator: Ghobrial, Tadros
Loewen, Mark
metadata.dcterms:description: for the first time, time-lapse images of the formation, growth and release mechanisms of anchor ice in rivers were captured.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Engineering
Physics
Anchor ice
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Ghobrial et al., 2019. In-situ measurements of anchor ice formation and release, In proceedings of the CGU HS Committee on River Ice Processes and the Environment 20th Workshop on the Hydraulics of Ice Covered Rivers., Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, May 14-16, 2019. , http://www.cripe.ca/docs/proceedings/20/Ghobrial-et-al-2019.pdf
